topics: Enforcing a National Prevention Strategy for children under the minimum age of criminal responsibility risking involvement in criminal activities.
Integrating different cultural, political and economic realities into society to avoid the onset of episodes of public disturbance in urban areas.
Prevention of natural disasters in order to minimize climate migration.
Developing innovative technologies to prevent marine pollution, promoting cooperation amongst nations in this field and consequent creation of new job opportunities.
Stimulating international cooperation to prevent Brain Drain creating suitable job opportunities in the country of origin in order to preserve national identity.
Enhancing measures to prevent child slavery and forced labor in developing countries.
Reducing Factory Farming, analyzing and keeping under control synthetic food production.
Ensure access to safe and nutritious food for civilians in conflict-affected areas.
Avoiding unethical space colonization and creating a regulation to reduce consequent space pollution.
Ensuring that International Space Programme remains unaffected by international tensions.
Implementation of Ottawa Treaty on the prohibition of use, stockpiling, production and transfer of anti-personnel mines.
Implementation of measures to regulate the role of social media in fueling conflicts in order to prevent fake news propaganda.
